**Smart Toothbrush with Oral Health Monitoring**: Integrate a Bluetooth-connected toothbrush with an app that tracks brushing habits, provides feedback on areas needing more attention, and sends reminders for optimal brushing techniques. The app could also offer personalized dental care advice based on user data.

**Eco-Friendly Toothbrush**: Develop a toothbrush made from sustainable materials such as bamboo or recycled plastics. Include a compostable or biodegradable packaging option to encourage eco-conscious consumers.

**Oral Care Robot Toothbrush**: Create a robotic toothbrush that can adapt its brushing intensity based on real-time analysis of plaque levels in different areas of the mouth. This would ensure a more thorough cleaning experience tailored to individual needs.

**Dental Health Education Toothbrush**: Attach a small screen to the handle of the toothbrush that displays educational videos about oral hygiene, proper brushing techniques, and information about dental health. This could help users learn while they brush.

**Multi-functional Toothbrush**: Design a toothbrush with additional features like flossing capabilities, tongue cleaning, and even the ability to apply mouthwash directly from the brush. This would simplify morning routines and promote better oral health.
